validation.positive: Amount must be a positive number

testnet.connect: Connect your wallet to begin or read
testnet.live: 🎉 Mero is now live on Kovan Testnet.

avoidLiquidation.description: 当需要补充保证金时，存放在Mero的备用资产将自动转到贷款协议以作保证金

earnYield.description: 透过建基于Convex和Curve的流动资产挖矿策略赚取最大回报

feeShare.description: 流动性提供者能分享从补充保证金服务所获得的手续费

reactiveLiquidity.description: Create Actions to automate your liquidity to where it is needed most.

components.moreInDocs: Find out more in the docs

errors.support: Please try again in a moment. If the error persists, you can contact us on
errors.tryTestnet: Mero is not yet live on mainnet. You can test it now on Kovan by switching networks.
errors.wrongNetwork: Wrong network selected, please use a development network

curveImbalance.description: Keepers can detect when LP pools become imbalanaced and remove liquidity for you on your behalf - saving you from substantial losses.

limitOrders.description: Once a limit order can be filled, a Keeper can withdraw the required funds from yield pools and execute the trade on the AMM.

nfts.description: Create a limit order for an NFT with a specific set of rarity traits. Once the price drops within your desired amount, a purchase Action is executed and liquidity is removed from Mero’s yield pools.

propose.description: Actions can be added through the Mero DAO. Join the Mero community and propose a new action!

uniswap.description: Mero Keepers detect when the price has moved outside of your defined range and move the liquidity into Mero’s yield pools. Once the price is back within range, Keepers move your liquidity back into Uniswap.

getStarted.description: 存入流动资产以赚取收益

claim.description: 随时取消登记、更新仓位、提取LP凭证或领取Mero收益

deposit.description: 为Mero流动性池存款以获得LP凭证

protect.description: 赚取随LP凭证单价增长的复合收益，同时享受守门人(Keeper)保障免受清算的服务

register.description: 登记来自Compound或Aave的链上贷款以获得抵押品补充并质押LP凭证以赚取Mero收益

claim.description: 随时解除LP凭证的质押或领取Mero收益

deposit.description: 为Mero流动性池存款以获得LP凭证

earn.description: 透过策略收益和协议收入，赚取随LP凭证单价增长的复合收益

landingPage.subHeader: 一个去信任化利息生成，旨在防止担保贷款被清算的保护协议

notFound.subHeader: Try one of the handy links below - or <0>get in touch</0> if you believe there is an issue.

apy.tooltip: The current annual percent yield earned by pool LPs

strategy.tooltip: The current protocol funds are allocated to for yield farming strategies

tvl.tooltip: The market capitalization of assets held in the pool (total value locked)

pool.overview: Deposit {{asset}} to begin earning yield via the {{strategy}} strategy. Once you have deposited, you can make your liquidity reactive by opening a top-up position.

deposits.tooltip: The current value of your assets held in the pools

input.labelDesktop: Enter an amount of {{asset}} to deposit
Enter an amount of {{asset}} to withdraw

apy.tooltip: The average annual percent yield over a 30 day period

revenue.tooltip: The total value of fees generated by the Mero protocol

tvl.tooltip: The market capitalization of total assets held in Mero liquidity pools (total value locked)

pools.overview: Mero’s single-asset pools aggregate yield across strategies. After depositing an asset, register a top-up position to protect from liquidation on supported collateralized lending protocols.

deposits.tooltip: The current value of your assets held in Mero liquidity pools

rewards.tooltip: The current value of earned rewards that have yet to be claimed

stake.description: Stake MERO and earn a share in x% of platform revenue, paid out in meroDAI tokens.
stake.inputDesktop: Enter an amount of MERO to stake

unstake.description: Stake MERO and earn a share in x% of platform revenue, paid out in meroDAI tokens.
unstake.inputDesktop: Enter an amount of MERO to unstake
